name: Clickme
tagline: ClickMe will help you to create a test page for Click jacking vulnerability
body:
### About
If a website is vulnerable to Clickjacking ,then target web page can be loaded into an frame.
To do this we need to create a simple web page that includes a frame containing the target web page.
This can be done using Click Me in easy steps.
### Usage

1.Give the target site address.

2.Hit the Click Me button.

3.That's it! Now please check whether your site is getting loaded in a frame.


Please refer OWASP web site to know more about Clickjacking vulnerability.
### Contributors

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
